JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Crane Truck Driver with Crane E Certificate Wanted
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Location: Zealand (various assignments)
Start Date: As soon as possible

Job Description:

We are looking for a qualified and reliable crane truck driver to handle crane operations and transport assignments across Zealand. You’ll play a vital role in delivering goods safely and efficiently.

Requirements:
  • Valid Crane E Certificate.
  • Valid C or CE driver’s license and driver’s card.
  • Basic experience with crane operations (training provided for the right candidate).
  • Punctuality, reliability, and a positive attitude.
We Offer:
  • Competitive salary and good working conditions.
  • Assignments across Zealand with varied tasks.
  • Training and opportunities to develop your skills.
  • Immediate start for the right candidate.
How to Apply:

Send your CV and application to: Info@firstvirkar.dk

or apply on our website: https://www.firstvikar.dk/for-jobsogende/

We look forward to hearing from you!
